request.prompt:
Schreibe mir einen News Artikel mit dem Titel "Cluely, a startup that helps ‚Äòcheat on everything,‚Äô raises $15M from a16z". 
Der Artikel soll etwa 1 Seite lang sein und mit Markdown formatiert sein. Der Titel soll nicht im Artikel enthalten sein, der Artikel soll direkt mit dem ersten Absatz beginnen. F√ºge ein <!--more--> zwischen dem ersten und zweiten Absatz ein.
Verwende dabei nur Informationen der letzten 7 Tage, sodass der Artikel nur die aktuellen Neuigkeiten zu dem Thema enth√§lt.
F√ºge am Ende des Artikels einen Absatz mit den verlinkten Quellen hinzu.

args.query: Cluely startup raises $15M from a16z June 2025

Investing in Cluely
===================

[Bryan Kim](https://a16z.com/author/bryan-kim/) and [Eric Zhou](https://a16z.com/author/eric-zhou/)

Posted June 20, 2025

What if breaking the rules was the unlock?

We‚Äôre excited to announce our investment in [Cluely](https://cluely.com/), the AI-powered desktop assistant that delivers real-time support during everyday moments ‚Äî whether meetings, customer support calls, project brainstorming sessions, or collaborative tasks.

You‚Äôve almost certainly heard of Cluely‚Äôs founder, [Roy Lee](https://x.com/im_roy_lee) ‚Äî the mind behind viral stunts like [Interview Coder](https://x.com/interviewcoder) (which helped users ‚Äúcheat‚Äù on coding interviews), hiring 50 interns to fuel Cluely‚Äôs content engine, and his [infamous exit](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/roy-lee-goat_i-just-got-kicked-out-of-columbia-for-taking-activity-7310834407433453568-tqAm?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAAAtfg1IBYfxd10EdhxOkfqPkVLAxbRUrLDQ) from Columbia University. While Roy‚Äôs bold approach may seem outwardly controversial, behind the scenes his moves are rooted in deliberate strategy and intentionality.

Cluely‚Äôs AI-powered assistant operates discreetly on users‚Äô desktops, intelligently interpreting live audio and on-screen context to deliver proactive insights. This lightweight tool has quickly become important in high-stakes professional settings. Initially popularized among consumers through dramatic marketing campaigns, Cluely has already proven its value in enterprise environments ‚Äî particularly in sales ‚Äî quickly securing contracts and deployments.

The team‚Äôs strength in distribution (the growth team is comprised of [7 people](https://x.com/im_roy_lee/status/1934740529113432139) who have independently grown personal audiences of over 100,000 followers apiece) has driven impressive brand awareness and mindshare: within a few weeks of launch, Cluely generated meaningful consumer subscription revenue, boosted by viral campaigns and systematic user-generated content. The strength of this initial traction underscores the clear demand for innovative, real-time productivity tools.

We see real opportunity in Cluely‚Äôs vision to pioneer a new category of proactive, multimodal AI assistants. Unlike traditional note-taking and transcription products, Cluely combines instantaneous responsiveness with deep contextual understanding, effectively positioning it across the consumer and enterprise markets.

Roy and his team are building with intention, creativity, and velocity, developing products that resonate deeply, scale quickly, and engage users in novel ways. We‚Äôre thrilled to support them on this journey. If you‚Äôre passionate about the future of real-time, AI-powered productivity, Cluely is hiring. Ch

Weitere Informationen finden Sie in unserer [Cookie-Richtlinie](/redirect?to=https%3A%2F%2Flegal.yahoo.com%2Fie%2Fde%2Fyahoo%2Fprivacy%2Fcookies%2Findex.html&brandDomain=&brandId=yahoo&tos=eu&step=&sessionId=3_cc-session_0267feca-6b2a-4e8d-b796-e556a5aae92e&userType=NON_REG).Cookies, um:

*   Ihre Nutzung unserer Websites und Apps zu MessungWir erfassen die Anzahl der Besucher auf unseren Seiten, den Ger√§tetyp (iOS oder Android), den verwendeten Browser sowie die Verweildauer auf unseren Websites und in unseren Apps. Diese Daten werden in aggregierter Form erfasst und nicht mit einzelnen Nutzern in Verbindung gebracht.messen

Wenn Sie auf ‚Äû**Alle akzeptieren**‚Äú klicken, speichern wir und [unsere Partner](/v2/partners-list?sessionId=3_cc-session_0267feca-6b2a-4e8d-b796-e556a5aae92e), einschlie√ülich der 238 Partner, die dem IAB Transparency & Consent Framework angeh√∂ren, Informationen auf einem Ger√§t (d.¬†h. wir verwenden Cookies) und k√∂nnen auf diese zugreifen. Wir verwenden genaue Standortdaten und andere personenbezogene Daten wie IP-Adressen, Browsing- und Suchdaten f√ºr Analysen, personalisierte Werbung und Inhalte, zur Messung von Werbung und Inhalten, zur Zielgruppenforschung und zur Weiterentwicklung von Diensten.

Klicken Sie auf ‚Äû**Alle ablehnen**‚Äú, wenn Sie nicht m√∂chten, dass wir und unsere Partner Cookies und personenbezogene Daten f√ºr diese zus√§tzlichen Zwecke verwenden.

Wenn Sie Ihre Auswahl anpassen m√∂chten, klicken Sie auf ‚Äû**Datenschutzeinstellungen verwalten**‚Äú.

Sie k√∂nnen Ihre Einwilligung jederzeit widerrufen oder Ihre Einstellungen √§ndern, indem Sie auf unseren Websites und in unseren Apps auf den Link ‚ÄûDatenschutz- und Cookie-Einstellungen‚Äú oder ‚ÄûDatenschutz-Dashboard‚Äú klicken. Weitere Informationen dar√ºber, wie wir Ihre personenbezogenen Daten nutzen, finden Sie in unserer [Datenschutzerkl√§rung](/redirect?to=https%3A%2F%2Flegal.yahoo.com%2Fie%2Fde%2Fyahoo%2Fprivacy%2Findex.html&brandDomain=&brandId=yahoo&tos=eu&step=&sessionId=3_cc-session_0267feca-6b2a-4e8d-b796-e556a5aae92e&userType=NON_REG) und unserer [Cookie-Richtlinie](/redirect?to=https%3A%2F%2Flegal.yahoo.com%2Fie%2Fde%2Fyahoo%2Fprivacy%2Fcookies%2Findex.html&brandDomain=&brandId=yahoo&tos=eu&step=&sessionId=3_cc-session_0267feca-6b2a-4e8d-b796-e556a5aae92e&userType=NON_REG).

Cluely Raises $15M to Scale Controversial 'Undetectable' AI Tool for Screen-Based Assistance
============================================================================================

#### The viral AI "cheating" startup is no stranger to marketing.

By [Jose Enrico](https://www.techtimes.com/reporters/jose-enrico)  
Updated: Jun 21 2025, 03:05 AM EDT

[Share on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www.techtimes.com/articles/310940/20250621/cluely-raises-15m-scale-controversial-undetectable-ai-tool-screen-based-assistance.htm) [Share on Twitter](https://x.com/intent/tweet?text=Cluely+Raises+%2415M+to+Scale+Controversial+%27Undetectable%27+AI+Tool+for+Screen-Based+Assistance+https://www.techtimes.com/articles/310940/20250621/cluely-raises-15m-scale-controversial-undetectable-ai-tool-screen-based-assistance.htm) [Share on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.techtimes.com%2Farticles%2F310940%2F20250621%2Fcluely-raises-15m-scale-controversial-undetectable-ai-tool-screen-based-assistance.htm&title=Cluely+Raises+%2415M+to+Scale+Controversial+%27Undetectable%27+AI+Tool+for+Screen-Based+Assistance) [Share on Reddit](http://reddit.com/submit?url=https://www.techtimes.com/articles/310940/20250621/cluely-raises-15m-scale-controversial-undetectable-ai-tool-screen-based-assistance.htm&title=Cluely+Raises+%2415M+to+Scale+Controversial+%27Undetectable%27+AI+Tool+for+Screen-Based+Assistance) [Share on Flipboard](https://flipboard.com) [Share on Pocket](https://getpocket.com/edit?url=https://www.techtimes.com/articles/310940/20250621/cluely-raises-15m-scale-controversial-undetectable-ai-tool-screen-based-assistance.htm)[](mailto:?&subject=Cluely+Raises+%2415M+to+Scale+Controversial+%27Undetectable%27+AI+Tool+for+Screen-Based+Assistance&body=https://www.techtimes.com/articles/310940/20250621/cluely-raises-15m-scale-controversial-undetectable-ai-tool-screen-based-assistance.htm)[](#discussion)

Cluely officially closed a new funding round of $15 million with lead investor Andreessen Horowitz (a16z), the company said Friday in an X (formerly Twitter) post. For those unfamiliar, it's a San Francisco-based startup that was once infamous for inviting users to ["cheat on everything.](https://www.techtimes.com/articles/310089/20250422/columbia-student-unveils-ai-cheating-tool-cheat-everything-after-it-got-him-kicked-out-college.htm)"

This is a major benchmark for the artificial intelligence company that has never been shy about web virality or scandal.

From Viral Suspension to Venture Capital
----------------------------------------

 [Cluely Raises $15M to Scale Controversial 'Undetectable' AI Tool for](https://x.com/im_roy_lee/status/1936138361011585190)

@im\_roy\_lee/X

First released as a utility to help software developers in job interviews, [Cluely](https://cluely.com/) has now reframed itself as an "invisible" AI helper that monitors users' screens and provides solutions in real-time, without alerting anyone.

Cluely first made headlines earlier this year when Roy Lee was suspended by Columbia University for a prototype version of the tool. That initial version openly advocated using it for cheating in interviews, prompting debate about ethics, technological boundaries, and academic honesty.

Since that rebranding, the company has removed overt mentions of "cheating" from its site. Rather, it now emphasizes positioning Cluely as a cutting-edge productivity booster driven by clandestine screen-native AI.

Even with the name changes and repositioning, the startup hasn't lost its rebellious tone‚Äîor its sense of humor.

**Read more:** [**Gemini Android's New Song Search Feature Lets You Hum to Identify Tunes Instantly**](/articles/310927/20250620/gemini-androids-new-song-search-feature-lets-you-hum-identify-tunes-instantly.htm)

Marketing Blitz Coming
----------------------

With fresh capital in hand, Lee is ready to double down on viral marketing. His ambitious goal? Reach 1 billion views across all social platforms.

"We'll do pretty much whatever it takes to do that," Lee told [Business Insider.](https://www.businessinsider.com/cluely-viral-ai-cheating-startup-15-million-a16z-2025-6)

> announcing [@cluely](https://twitter.com/cluely?ref_src=twsrc^tfw)'s $15M fundraise, led by [@a16z](https://twitter.com/a16z?ref_src=twsrc^tfw).  
>   
> cheat on everything. [pic.twitter.com/bACr8MpK2W](https://t.co/bACr8MpK2W)
> 
> ‚Äî Roy (@im\_roy\_lee) [June 20, 2025](https://twitter.c

Controversial AI Startup Cluely Raises $15M from Andreessen Horowitz, Sparking Ethical Debates
==============================================================================================

21 Jun 2025, 8:04 AM UTC

2 Sources

2 Sources
---------

[

\[1\]

TechCrunch

Cluely, a startup that helps 'cheat on everything', raises $15M from a16z | TechCrunch

Cluely, a startup that claims to help users "cheat" on job interviews, exams, and sales calls, has raised a $15 million Series A led by Andreessen Horowitz, the company announced on Friday with a video posted on X. Two investors who were not part of the deal tell TechCrunch they believe Cluely's post-money valuation is around $120 million. Andreessen Horowitz declined to comment on that figure. Lee didn't respond to a request for comment. Cluely's new funding comes roughly two months after it raised $5.3 million in seed funding co-led by Abstract Ventures and Susa Ventures. The startup was co-founded earlier this year by 21-year-old "Roy" Lee and Neel Shanmugam, who were suspended from Columbia University for developing an undetectable AI-powered tool called "Interview Coder" to help engineers cheat on technical interviews. Cluely is profitable, according to Lee's multiple posts on X and podcast appearances. Lee's provocative social media presence and highly produced controversial videos have helped to draw attention and create brand awareness for Cluely. Earlier this week, Cluely was hoping to throw a large party following Y Combinator's AI Startup School, a two-day event. But the police shut down the festivities after around 2,000 people tried to enter the venue, Lee told TechCrunch.







](https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/20/cluely-a-startup-that-helps-cheat-on-everything-raises-15m-from-a16z/)[

\[2\]

Bloomberg Business

Andreessen Horowitz Backs AI Startup With Slogan 'Cheat at Everything'

Andreessen Horowitz led a $15 million funding round for an artificial intelligence startup called Cluely Inc., famous on social platforms like X for controversial viral marketing stunts and the slogan "cheat on everything." The startup was co-founded by 21-year-old Roy Lee, who was booted from Columbia University earlier this year for creating a tool called Interview Coder that helped technical job candidates cheat on interviews using AI. At the time, he wrote on LinkedIn, "I'm completely kicked out from school. LOL!"







](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-06-21/andreessen-horowitz-backs-ai-startup-with-slogan-cheat-at-everything)

Share

Copy Link

Cluely, an AI startup with the slogan "cheat at everything," secures $15M in Series A funding led by Andreessen Horowitz, raising questions about the ethical implications of AI in various sectors.

### Controversial AI Startup Secures Major Funding

Cluely, an artificial intelligence startup with the provocative slogan "cheat at everything," has successfully raised $15 million in a Series A funding round led by prominent venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) [1](https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/20/cluely-a-startup-that-helps-cheat-on-everything-raises-15m-from-a16z/)[2](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-06-21/andreessen-horowitz-backs-ai-startup-with-slogan-cheat-at-everything). This significant investment has catapulted the company's estimated post-money valuation to around $120 million, according to sources close to the deal [1](https://techcrunch

result.content:
Cluely, ein Startup, das Nutzern hilft, bei Vorstellungsgespr√§chen, Pr√ºfungen und Verkaufsgespr√§chen zu "schummeln", hat eine Serie-A-Finanzierungsrunde in H√∂he von 15 Millionen US-Dollar abgeschlossen, die von Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) geleitet wurde. Die Finanzierung wurde am 20. Juni 2025 bekannt gegeben und markiert einen bedeutenden Meilenstein f√ºr das Unternehmen, das erst vor wenigen Monaten gegr√ºndet wurde. Cluely wurde von Roy Lee und Neel Shanmugam gegr√ºndet, die beide von der Columbia University suspendiert wurden, nachdem sie ein KI-Tool entwickelt hatten, das Bewerbern bei technischen Interviews half, zu schummeln.

<!--more-->

Cluelys KI-gest√ºtzter Desktop-Assistent bietet Echtzeit-Unterst√ºtzung w√§hrend allt√§glicher Aufgaben wie Meetings, Kundengespr√§chen und Projektbrainstormings. Das Tool analysiert live Audio- und Bildschirmkontexte und liefert proaktive Einblicke, ohne dass der Benutzer es bemerkt. Diese diskrete Funktionsweise hat Cluely schnell zu einem unverzichtbaren Werkzeug in professionellen Umgebungen gemacht, insbesondere im Vertrieb, wo es bereits bedeutende Vertr√§ge und Implementierungen sichern konnte.

Die Finanzierung durch a16z kommt nur zwei Monate nach einer Seed-Finanzierungsrunde in H√∂he von 5,3 Millionen US-Dollar, die von Abstract Ventures und Susa Ventures mitgeleitet wurde. Cluelys Gr√ºnder Roy Lee ist bekannt f√ºr seine provokanten Marketingkampagnen und seine starke Pr√§senz in den sozialen Medien, die dem Startup zu einer schnellen Bekanntheit verholfen haben. Trotz der Kontroversen um die ethischen Implikationen des Tools hat Cluely bereits eine bedeutende Anzahl von Abonnenten gewonnen und behauptet, profitabel zu sein.

Mit der neuen Finanzierung plant Cluely, seine Marketingbem√ºhungen zu intensivieren und seine Reichweite auf eine Milliarde Aufrufe in den sozialen Medien auszudehnen. Roy Lee hat angek√ºndigt, dass das Unternehmen alles tun wird, um dieses Ziel zu erreichen, und betont, dass Cluely weiterhin innovative und umstrittene Wege gehen wird, um seine Produkte zu vermarkten und zu skalieren.

### Quellen
